company_context: ABM Platform for B2B Sales & Marketing Success | Demandbase Open navigation Grow high-quality pipeline faster with the only AI platform built for how B2B really buys Demandbase unifies your data, aligns every GTM team, and turns signals into revenue based on the buying groups behind every decision Watch a demo Book a meeting Winning teams use Demandbase to grow 3X increase in conversions Adobe +52% increase in revenue SAP Concur +50% growth in average deal size Thermo Fisher Scientific +83% increase in pipeline velocity Ingram Micro Your sales and marketing simplified. Amplified by AI. AI built on 20 years of B2B data. From intent detection to automated plays, Demandbase orchestrates your whole revenue engine. Identify and engage the right buying groups in your accounts, not just contacts—at exactly the right moment—with messages tailored to exactly what they need. See what’s behind our data Pipeline AI automates your next best move Demandbase blends 1st, 2nd, and 3rd-party data into a single account view, then drives actions across sales and marketing, so you turn intent into pipeline at scale. Discover Agentbase See the full buying group Identify and engage entire buying groups, not just individual contacts, Blend all your account signals into a live view of every buying group and reach out exactly when they’re ready. Target buying groups Connect every team, tool, and data source Make it yours. Flexible, open and transparent, Demandbase connects seamlessly to your tech stack. Customize it, scale it, or use our data in your tools. You’re in control. See integrations The pipeline AI platform that unifies data, insights, and actions for true GTM outcomes Data from everywhere. Data you can trust. Integrate your first and our third-party party data to know who is in-market and what they are signaling. We always ensure that you have the best quantity and trusted quality of data fueling your business decisions. 1st Party: CRM, MAP, web activity, chat, email & calendar, and more. 3rd Party: Account ID, contact & buying group ID, firmographic, technographic, action and intent signals. AI-powered insights that you can see Harness transparent and tunable go-to-market intelligence generated through advanced AI and machine learning. Know who, how, when, and where to target with confidence. Most importantly, we’ll tell you why (it’s not a black box). Act with confidence Know your next best actions across marketing, advertising, and sales. All the data and insights in the world are not worth anything if you don’t act on them. Activate with clarity across all your go-to-market channels with the right automation, controls, measurement, and reporting. Unify your tech stack with integrations & APIs Enable seamless data flow for action anywhere. We’ll meet you where you are across your sales and marketing tech stack. Allow the data and insights to flow wherever you want them to be. Advertising CRM Marketing automation Content marketing platform Web personalization

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Emily and I'm a Sales Development Representative at DeepData AI. We're a data processing solution that helps B2B companies like yours unify their data, align their teams, and turn signals into revenue. I came across your company and was impressed with the work you're doing in the industry. Can you tell me a little bit about your current data management strategy?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Ah, hi Emily. Yeah, we're currently using a combination of tools to manage our data, but it's getting a bit fragmented. We're looking for ways to streamline our process and get more insights out of our data. What makes DeepData AI different from other solutions out there?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: That's a great question. Our AI-powered platform is built specifically for B2B companies, and it allows you to blend first, second, and third-party data into a single account view. This enables you to identify and engage with the right buying groups at the right moment, and automate your next best move. We've seen some great success with our existing clients, such as Adobe and SAP Concur.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: That sounds interesting, but I have to say, we're already invested in some other tools that are doing similar things. How does your pricing compare to what we're currently paying? And what kind of implementation and integration would we be looking at?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Our pricing is customized based on the specific needs of each company, but I can tell you that we typically fall in the range of $50,000 to $200,000 per year, depending on the scope of the project. As for implementation, we have a dedicated team that will work with you to integrate our platform with your existing tools and tech stack. It's usually a pretty seamless process.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I see. Well, I have to say, the price is a bit higher than I was expecting. We're on a tight budget this quarter, and I'm not sure if we can justify the expense. Can you tell me more about the ROI that your clients have seen? And how does your solution handle data quality and integrity?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Absolutely. Our clients have seen some amazing results, with an average increase of 3X in conversions and 50% growth in average deal size. As for data quality, we have a robust system in place to ensure that the data is accurate and up-to-date. We also provide ongoing support and maintenance to ensure that the platform is running smoothly.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate the information, Emily, but I think we're going to have to pass on this opportunity. The price is just too high for us, and we can't justify the expense at this time. I appreciate your time and effort, but I think we'll have to explore other options that fit within our budget.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand, and I appreciate your honesty. If you're willing, I'd like to send you some more information and follow up with you in the future to see if our solution might be a better fit for you at a later time.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: That's okay, Emily. I think we've made our decision. Thank you again for your time, and I wish you and DeepData AI all the best.

analysis.raw:
Score: 4
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Price
Feedback: The seller should have been more prepared to address the buyer's pricing concerns and potentially offered more flexible pricing options or a trial to alleviate the cost barrier. Sentiment: Neutral
